snippet.title: 3DO - PS2 - 24/7 - Heroes of Might and Magic: Quest for the Dragon Bone Staff Trailer
snippet.description: Early video of the PS2 version of Heroes of Might and Magic: Quest for the Dragon Bone Staff from a 3DO demo disc given away with new PS2's bought in Game stores in the UK. DVD is dated 4th February 2001. I haven't done anything to the footage, it's as grainy as that on the disc.
